missions.name: First Trade
missions.subtitle: Your investing journey begins!
missions.goal: Make a 2% profit by buying and selling stocks!
missions.description: Learn the basics of buying low and selling high.
tips: Start simple! Pick one stock you like.
Watch how prices move up and down.
Try to buy low and sell high!

missions.name: Steady Growth
missions.subtitle: Build a balanced portfolio!
missions.goal: Earn 5% profit with at least 2 different stocks!
missions.description: Learn about diversification by owning multiple stocks.
tips: Don't put all your eggs in one basket!
Balance risky stocks with safer ones.

missions.name: Market News
missions.subtitle: React to breaking news!
missions.goal: Earn 8% profit by reading and reacting to news!
missions.description: Learn how news events affect stock prices.
tips: Good news usually helps, bad news hurts.
Act fast when you see important news!
